# Pull Request

## Description

Please describe your changes and the motivation behind them.

## Type of Change

- [ ] New resource (tutorial, course, video, etc.)
- [ ] New example server
- [ ] Documentation improvement
- [ ] Bug fix
- [ ] Other (please describe)

## Checklist

- [ ] I have tested any code examples
- [ ] All links are working
- [ ] Content follows the existing format
- [ ] I have added the resource to the appropriate section
- [ ] Spelling and grammar are correct
- [ ] Content is relevant to MCP

## Additional Notes

Any additional information that would be helpful for reviewers.
